message.name: ERR_FV_MANDATORY_FIRST_NAME
message.locale: First Name must be entered.

message.name: ERR_FV_MANDATORY_USER_NAME
message.locale: User Name must be entered.

message.name: ERR_FV_MANDATORY_PASSWORD
message.locale: Password must be entered.

message.name: ERR_FV_FIRSTNAME_TOO_LONG
message.locale: The first name can be at most %1n characters.

message.name: ERR_FV_MANDATORY_LASTNAME
message.locale: Last Name must be entered.

message.name: ERR_FV_LASTNAME_TOO_LONG
message.locale: The last name can be at most %1n characters.

message.name: ERR_FV_USERNAME_TOO_SHORT
message.locale: The user name must be at least %1n characters.

message.name: ERR_FV_USERNAME_TOO_LONG
message.locale: The user name can be at most %1n characters.

message.name: ERR_FV_PASSWORD_TOO_SHORT
message.locale: The password must be at least %1n characters.

message.name: ERR_FV_PASSWORD_TOO_LONG
message.locale: The password can be at most %1n characters.

message.name: ERR_FV_PASSWORD_MIN_SPECIAL_CHARS
message.locale: The password must contain at least %1n number(s) and/or special characters.

message.name: ERR_FV_MANDATORY_SECURITY_QUESTION
message.locale: You must provide an answer for the selected security question.

message.name: ERR_FV_MANDATORY_ANSWER
message.locale: You must provide an answer for the selected security question.

message.name: ERR_FV_INVALID_USER
message.locale: Invalid user.

message.name: ERR_INVALID_SECURITY_QUESTION
message.locale: This is not the security question that you selected when you set up your account. Please select the correct security question.

message.name: ERR_FV_INVALID_ANSWER
message.locale: Invalid question or answer. Please try again.

message.name: ERR_FV_ERR_USER_PASSWORD_ERROR
message.locale: The Password field and the Confirm Password field contain different values.

message.name: ERR_FV_ERR_INVALID_USER_QUESTION_OR_ANSWER
message.locale: Invalid user, question or answer. Please try again.

message.name: ERR_FV_MANDATORY_TERMS_AND_CONDITIONS
message.locale: You must accept the terms and conditions.

message.name: ERR_FV_USERNAME_MAX_LENGTH
message.locale: You must enter a valid username.

message.name: ERR_FV_CURRENT_PASSWORD
message.locale: Current Password must be entered.

message.name: ERR_FV_NEW_PASSWORD
message.locale: New Password must be entered.

message.name: ERR_FV_NEW_PASSWORD_TWICE
message.locale: New Password must be entered twice.

message.name: ERR_FV_INVALID_EMAIL_ADDRESS
message.locale: Invalid email address. Please provide a valid email address.

message.name: ERR_FV_NEW_PASSWORD_UNCHANGED
message.locale: You cannot change your password to be your existing password.
